009
010package imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive;
011
012import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
013import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
014import imagingbook.common.threshold.global.OtsuThresholder;
015import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
016
017/**
018 * <p>
019 * This adaptive thresholder splits the image into non-overlapping square
020 * sub-images, computes the optimal threshold within each sub-image 
021 * (using a {@link OtsuThresholder}) and interpolates linearly between 
022 * these local thresholds. See also Sec. 9.4 of [1] for a description.
023 * </p>
024 * <p>
025 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
026 * </p>
027 * 
028 * @author WB
029 * @version 2022/08/01
030 */
031public class InterpolatingThresholder implements AdaptiveThresholder {
032        
033        /**
034         * Parameters for class {@link InterpolatingThresholder}.
035         */
036        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
037                @DialogLabel("Tile size")
038                public int tileSize = 32;
039                
040                @DialogLabel("Background mode")
041                public BackgroundMode bgMode = BackgroundMode.DARK;
042        }
043        
044        private final Parameters params;
045        
046        public InterpolatingThresholder() {
047                this.params = new Parameters();
048        }
049        
050        public InterpolatingThresholder(Parameters params) {
051                this.params = params;
052        }
053
054        @Override
055        public ByteProcessor getThreshold(ByteProcessor ip) {
056                final int W = ip.getWidth();
057                final int H = ip.getHeight();
058                final int tileSize = params.tileSize;
059                
060                // determine number of tiles
061                int nW = (W % tileSize == 0) ? (W / tileSize + 1) : (W / tileSize + 2);
062                int nH = (H % tileSize == 0) ? (H / tileSize + 1) : (H / tileSize + 2);
063                
064                int[][] tiles = new int[nW][nH];
065                int s0 = tileSize / 2;  // center of title (s0 + s1 = tileSize)
066//              int s1 = tileSize - s0;
067
068                // compute threshold for each tile
069                int[] h = new int[256];
070                OtsuThresholder thr = new OtsuThresholder();
071
072                int q_ = (params.bgMode == BackgroundMode.DARK) ? 256 : 0;
073
074                for (int j = 0, v0 = 0; j < nH; j++, v0 += tileSize) {
075                        for (int i = 0, u0 = 0; i < nW; i++, u0 += tileSize) {
076                                getSubimageHistogram(ip, u0 - s0, v0 - s0, tileSize, h);
077                                int q = thr.getThreshold(h);
078                                if (q < 0) q = q_; // no threshold found in this tile
079                                tiles[i][j] = q;
080                                //IJ.log(i + "/" + j + ": " + q);
081                        }
082                }
083                
084                ByteProcessor thrIp = new ByteProcessor(W, H);
085                
086                for (int j = 0, v0 = 0; j < nH; j++, v0 += tileSize) {
087                        for (int i = 0, u0 = 0; i < nW; i++, u0 += tileSize) {
088                                // Rectangle re = new Rectangle(u0-s0, v0-s0, u0-s0+tileSize, v0-s0+tileSize);
089                                for (int v = v0 - s0; v < v0 - s0 + tileSize; v++) {
090                                        for (int u = u0 - s0; u < u0 - s0 + tileSize; u++) {
091                                                thrIp.putPixel(u, v, tiles[i][j]);
092                                        }
093                                }
094                        }
095                }
096                
097                // linearly interpolate
098                for (int j = 0, v0 = 0; j < nH - 1; j++, v0 += tileSize) {
099                        for (int i = 0, u0 = 0; i < nW - 1; i++, u0 += tileSize) {
100                                int A = tiles[i][j];
101                                int B = tiles[i + 1][j];
102                                int C = tiles[i][j + 1];
103                                int D = tiles[i + 1][j + 1];
104
105                                // interpolate within [u0, v0, u0 + tileSize, v0 + tileSize]
106                                for (int v = v0; v < v0 + tileSize; v++) {
107                                        double dy = (double) (v - v0) / tileSize;
108                                        double AC = A + dy * (C - A);
109                                        double BD = B + dy * (D - B);
110                                        for (int u = u0; u < u0 + tileSize; u++) {
111                                                double dx = (double) (u - u0) / tileSize;
112                                                double ABCD = AC + dx * (BD - AC);
113                                                // thrIp.putPixel(u,v,tiles[i][j]);
114                                                thrIp.putPixel(u, v, (int) Math.rint(ABCD));
115                                        }
116                                }
117
118                        }
119                }
120                        
121                return thrIp;
122        }
123        
124        private void getSubimageHistogram(ByteProcessor ip, int u0, int v0, int size, int[] h) {
125                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
126                        h[i] = 0;
127                }
128                for (int v = v0; v < v0 + size; v++) {
129                        for (int u = u0; u < u0 + size; u++) {
130                                int p = getPaddedPixel(ip, u, v);
131                                h[p]++;
132                        }
133                }
134        }
135        
136        // TODO: change to use ImageAccessor!
137        private int getPaddedPixel(ByteProcessor bp, int u, int v) {
138                final int w = bp.getWidth();
139                final int h = bp.getHeight();
140                if (u < 0)
141                        u = 0;
142                else if (u >= w)
143                        u = w - 1;
144                if (v < 0)
145                        v = 0;
146                else if (v >= h)
147                        v = h - 1;
148                return bp.get(u, v);
149        }
150
151}
